channel.title: Problem changing video aspect ratio - exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg
channel.description:
Hi,
I have been changed resolution without problem, but when I try to change te aspect ratio from 4:3 to 16:9 nothing happends.. and I get this message in the console:
exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg Host_WriteConfiguration: Wrote cfg/config.cfg
any ideas? thanks!!

item.title: Problem changing video aspect ratio - exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg
item.dc:creator: dskmusic
item.description:
Hi,

I have been changed resolution without problem, but when I try to change te aspect ratio from 4:3 to 16:9 nothing happends… and I get this message in the console:

exec: couldn’t exec userconfig.cfg
exec: couldn’t exec userconfig.cfg
Host_WriteConfiguration: Wrote cfg/config.cfg

any ideas? thanks!!
